price: 37.  Qofkii doona inuu ku hormaro (camallo san) ama  dib ugu haro (xume fal),
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
